ItemFilterRegex.Name: Dungeons
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: (?<!Reward.*)(?<! Heroic )(Throne of the Tides|Blackrock Caverns|Grim Batol|Halls of Origination|Lost City of the Tol'vir|The Stonecore|The Vortex Pinnacle)
